name: Tradable LatAm Middle-Market Lender SSTL
description: This project, facilitated by Tradable.xyz on ZKsync Era, tokenizes mexican private credit provider is seeking a credit facility to back lever existing portfolio and finance future investments. The notes are issued by Victory Park Capital Advisors under the "LatAm Middle-Market Lender Senior Secured Term Loan" deal, giving on-chain exposure to the underlying cash flows. Tradable integrates traditional and decentralized finance, employing smart contracts for AML/KYC compliance to ensure regulatory standards. The platform enhances liquidity and investor access to the multi‑trillion‑dollar private credit market, streamlining asset management and due diligence via a user‑friendly interface. By leveraging ZKsync Era's scalable and secure infrastructure, the project connects existing financial systems to blockchain rails while preserving data privacy and reducing settlement costs.
